meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ, ຕ້ອງການບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He asked for more information about the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮ້ອງຂໍຂໍ້ມູນເພີ່ມເຕີມກ່ຽວກັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອທໍາລາຍ (ເຄື່ອງຈັກຫຼືຍານພາຫະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The car broke down on the way to work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດເສຍຫຼັກເສຍຫຼັກໄປເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງໄຫ້, ເສຍອາລົມ
meaning list.sentence: She broke down in tears after hearing the bad news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ນ້ຳ​ຕາ​ໄຫລ​ເມື່ອ​ໄດ້​ຍິນ​ຂ່າວ​ຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຍົກບັນຫາ
meaning list.sentence: He brought up the issue during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ຍົກ​ເອົາ​ບັນຫາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໃນ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ້ຽງຄົນ, ລ້ຽງຄົນ
meaning list.sentence: She brought up her children on her own.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລ້ຽງລູກຂອງລາວຢ່າງດຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຍົກເລີກ
meaning list.sentence: They called off the meeting due to bad weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຍົກ​ເລີກ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ​ອາ​ກາດ​ບໍ່​ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສືບຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: She decided to carry on with her studies despite the challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ລາວໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈສືບຕໍ່ການສຶກສາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ຈະ​ມາ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​, ເພື່ອ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ຫນ້າ​
meaning list.sentence: I came across an old photo while cleaning the attic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດຄ່ວນ, ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຫັນຮູບເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາກັບແນວຄວາມຄິດຫຼືການແກ້ໄຂ
meaning list.sentence: She came up with a great idea for the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ມີຄວາມຄິດທີ່ດີສໍາລັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວ້ວາງໃຈ, ອີງໃສ່
meaning list.sentence: You can count on me to help you with the task.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດນັບຂ້ອຍເພື່ອຊ່ວຍເຈົ້າໃນວຽກງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດອອກ, ຕັດການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: The storm cut off the electricity in the whole area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ມີ​ພະ​ລັງ​ງານ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລີກຮຽນ, ເລີກຮຽນ
meaning list.sentence: He dropped out of college to start his own business.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ອອກຈາກມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນທຸລະກິດຂອງຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດທ້າຍຢູ່ໃນສະຖານະການ
meaning list.sentence: He ended up working in a completely different field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ທີ່​ສຸດ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເລີ່ມ​ຕົ້ນ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໃນ​ພາກ​ສະ​ຫນາມ​ທີ່​ແຕກ​ຕ່າງ​ກັນ​ຢ່າງ​ສົມ​ບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: to fall apart , ຕົກ​ຈາກ​ກັນ​
meaning list.sentence: The old book fell apart when I opened it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມເກົ່າໆໄດ້ຕົກລົງເປັນຕ່ອນໆເມື່ອຂ້ອຍເປີດມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸບ​ທາງ​ຈິດ​ໃຈ​
meaning list.sentence: She fell apart after the loss of her pet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ລົ້ມລົງໃນຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກຫຼັງຈາກສູນເສຍສັດລ້ຽງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ໄຂ, ເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: It took me hours to figure out the solution to the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງເພື່ອຫາທາງອອກຂອງບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຽນ​ຮູ້​, ຄົ້ນ​ພົບ​
meaning list.sentence: I just found out that the meeting was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຫາກໍ່ຮູ້ວ່າກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ຖືກຍົກເລີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າກັນໄດ້ດີ
meaning list.sentence: They get along really well despite their differences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງຂອງພວກເຂົາ, ພວກເຂົາເຂົ້າກັນໄດ້ດີຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ່ນຫນີ, ຫນີໄປ
meaning list.sentence: The thief managed to get away before the police arrived.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນສາມາດຫລົບຫນີໄດ້ກ່ອນທີ່ຕໍາຫຼວດຈະມາຮອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້ຮັບຫຼາຍກວ່າ, ປິ່ນປົວ
meaning list.sentence: It took her months to get over the breakup.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນເພື່ອເອົາຊະນະການແຕກແຍກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຈຳນົນ, ຍອມແພ້
meaning list.sentence: He finally gave in to the pressure and agreed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ທີ່​ສຸດ ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຄວາມ​ກົດ​ດັນ​ແລະ​ໄດ້​ຕົກ​ລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມແພ້, ອອກໄປ
meaning list.sentence: She gave up smoking after many years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຊົາສູບຢາພາຍຫຼັງຫຼາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່ຕາມ, ໄລ່ຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: He decided to go after his dreams and start his own business.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈປະຕິບັດຕາມຄວາມຝັນຂອງລາວແລະເລີ່ມຕົ້ນທຸລະກິດຂອງຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສືບຕໍ່, ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນເຮັດບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: You can go ahead with the presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດສືບຕໍ່ການນໍາສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ, ທົບທວນຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: Let’s go over the report one more time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍໃຫ້ທົບທວນບົດລາຍງານອີກຄັ້ງຫນຶ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕີບໃຫຍ່, ເຕີບໃຫຍ່
meaning list.sentence: I grew up in a small village.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຕີບໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນບ້ານນ້ອຍໆ.

meaning list.meaning: hang out, ໃຊ້ເວລາ
meaning list.sentence: We usually hang out at the coffee shop after school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາປົກກະຕິແລ້ວ hang out ຢູ່ຄາເຟຫຼັງໂຮງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລໍຖ້າ, ຖື
meaning list.sentence: Hold on for a second while I grab my phone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລໍຖ້າວິນາທີໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂ້ອຍຈັບໂທລະສັບຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສືບຕໍ່, ສືບຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: She kept on studying until she passed the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສືບຕໍ່ສຶກສາຈົນກ່ວາລາວຜ່ານການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ, ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The event will kick off at 7 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານຈະເລີ່ມໃນເວລາ 19:00 ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບິ່ງແຍງ, ເບິ່ງແຍງ
meaning list.sentence: She looks after her younger siblings while their parents work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເບິ່ງແຍງນ້ອງໆຂອງນາງໃນຂະນະທີ່ພໍ່ແມ່ເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທ
meaning list.sentence: I’m looking for my keys. Have you seen them?
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍກໍາລັງຊອກຫາກະແຈຂອງຂ້ອຍ. ເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຫັນພວກມັນບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຫວັງວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: I’m looking forward to meeting you tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຫວັງວ່າຈະໄດ້ພົບກັບເຈົ້າໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊອກຫາຂໍ້ມູນ (ວັດຈະນານຸກົມ, ອິນເຕີເນັດ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: I had to look up the meaning of the word in the dictionary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງຊອກຫາຄວາມຫມາຍຂອງຄໍາທີ່ຢູ່ໃນວັດຈະນານຸກົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດໃຫ້ສັນຕິພາບ
meaning list.sentence: They finally made up after their big argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ໂຕ້​ຖຽງ​ໃຫຍ່​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ, ສຸດ​ທ້າຍ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເຖິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດໃຫ້ເຖິງ
meaning list.sentence: He made up an excuse to leave early.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ແກ້​ຕົວ​ໃຫ້​ອອກ​ໄປ​ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາຍ, ຕາຍ
meaning list.sentence: Her grandfather passed away last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພໍ່ຕູ້ຂອງລາວໄດ້ເສຍຊີວິດໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ຈະເລືອກເອົາ
meaning list.sentence: She picked out a beautiful dress for the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເລືອກເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງທີ່ສວຍງາມສໍາລັບງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ (ບາງຄົນຫຼືບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ)
meaning list.sentence: Can you pick me up from the airport tomorrow?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດໄປຮັບຂ້ອຍຈາກສະໜາມບິນມື້ອື່ນໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈ, ຊີ້ໃຫ້ເຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: She pointed out the mistakes in the report.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຊີ້ໃຫ້ເຫັນຄວາມຜິດພາດໃນບົດລາຍງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊ້າ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to put off the meeting until next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ເລື່ອນ​ການ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄປ​ຈົນ​ກ​່​ວາ​ອາ​ທິດ​ຕໍ່​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ນຸ່ງ, ໃສ່
meaning list.sentence: He put on his jacket before going outside.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ເສື້ອກັນ ໜາວ ກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວທີ (ຫຼິ້ນ, ເຫດການ)
meaning list.sentence: The school put on a wonderful performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນໄດ້ສະແດງການສະແດງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ຫນ້າ​, ກັບ​ມາ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​
meaning list.sentence: I ran into an old friend at the supermarket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍແລ່ນໄປຫາໝູ່ເກົ່າຢູ່ຮ້ານສັບພະສິນຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອບໍລິໂພກ, ສິ້ນສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: We ran out of milk, so I need to go to the store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາອອກຈາກນົມ, ສະນັ້ນຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄປຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງຄ່າ, ແກ້ໄຂ
meaning list.sentence: They set up a new office in the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ຫ້ອງການ​ໃໝ່​ຢູ່​ໃຈກາງ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນ off, ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນ off
meaning list.sentence: He always shows off his new gadgets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າສະເຫມີສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນ off gadgets ໃຫມ່ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປິດ (ທຸລະກິດ, ເຄື່ອງ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: The company decided to shut down the factory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈປິດໂຮງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ້າລົງ, ຊ້າລົງ
meaning list.sentence: You need to slow down when driving through the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນຊ້າລົງໃນເວລາຂັບລົດຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້​ໄຂ​, ຈັດ​ຕັ້ງ​
meaning list.sentence: We need to sort out the issues before the deadline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາກ່ອນທີ່ຈະກໍານົດເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈ, ໂດດເດັ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: Her performance really stood out from the rest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະຕິບັດຂອງພຣະອົງຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງຢືນອອກຈາກສ່ວນທີ່ເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້າຍ​ຄື (ສະ​ມາ​ຊິກ​ຄອບ​ຄົວ​)
meaning list.sentence: He takes after his father in both looks and personality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄ້າຍຄືກັບພໍ່ຂອງລາວທັງຮູບລັກສະນະແລະບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົນ​ຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The plane took off on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນໄດ້ອອກຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອດ (ເສື້ອຜ້າ)
meaning list.sentence: She took off her coat as it got warmer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອມັນອົບອຸ່ນຂຶ້ນ, ລາວຖອດເສື້ອຄຸມຂອງລາວອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ຈະ​ຮັບ​ເອົາ​, ການ​ຄວບ​ຄຸມ​
meaning list.sentence: The new manager will take over the project next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຄົນໃໝ່ຈະເຂົ້າຮັບໜ້າທີ່ໂຄງການໃນອາທິດໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: Don't throw away that book; I still want to read it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າຖິ້ມປຶ້ມນັ້ນໄປ; ຂ້ອຍຍັງຢາກອ່ານມັນຢູ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: She turned down the job offer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິເສດການສະເຫນີວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕນລົງ
meaning list.sentence: Can you turn down the music, please?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດປິດສຽງເພງໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຫັນ​ປ່ຽນ​, ການ​ຫັນ​ປ່ຽນ​
meaning list.sentence: The old factory was turned into a museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານເກົ່າຖືກປ່ຽນເປັນຫໍພິພິທະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິດ (ເຄື່ອງ​ມື​ໄຟ​ຟ້າ​)
meaning list.sentence: Please turn off the lights before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາປິດໄຟກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດ (ເຄື່ອງ​ມື​ໄຟ​ຟ້າ​)
meaning list.sentence: He turned on the TV to watch the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປີດໂທລະທັດເພື່ອເບິ່ງຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຮອດ, ປາກົດ
meaning list.sentence: She turned up late to the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມາຊ້າໃນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: Can you turn up the volume? I can’t hear it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດເປີດລະດັບສຽງໄດ້ບໍ? ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ຍິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອບໍລິໂພກ, ສໍາເລັດຮູບ
meaning list.sentence: We used up all the sugar while baking the cake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໃຊ້້ໍາຕານທັງຫມົດໃນຂະນະທີ່ເຮັດເຄ້ກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕື່ນ, ຕື່ນ
meaning list.sentence: I wake up at 7 a.m. every day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕື່ນແຕ່ 7 ໂມງເຊົ້າທຸກໆມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາໃຈໃສ່
meaning list.sentence: Watch out for cars when crossing the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະວັງລົດເມື່ອຂ້າມທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ແກ້​ໄຂ​, ການ​ແກ້​ໄຂ​
meaning list.sentence: We need to work out a solution to this problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຊອກຫາວິທີແກ້ໄຂບັນຫານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ
meaning list.sentence: He works out at the gym every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອອກກໍາລັງກາຍຢູ່ຫ້ອງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍທຸກໆເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນທຶກ, ຂຽນ
meaning list.sentence: Don’t forget to write down the address.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າລືມຂຽນທີ່ຢູ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ
meaning list.sentence: His friends backed him up during the argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມູ່ເພື່ອນຂອງລາວໄດ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການໂຕ້ວາທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຮອງ (ຂໍ້ມູນ)
meaning list.sentence: You should back up your files regularly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນສໍາຮອງຂໍ້ມູນໄຟລ໌ຂອງທ່ານເປັນປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກເຂົ້າໄປໃນ
meaning list.sentence: Someone tried to break in last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ ມີຄົນພະຍາຍາມບຸກເຂົ້າໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກໃນ
meaning list.sentence: She broke in while I was explaining.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂັດຂວາງຂ້ອຍໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂ້ອຍກໍາລັງອະທິບາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອທໍາລາຍ (ສົງຄາມ, ການລະບາດ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: A fire broke out in the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟໄຫມ້ໄດ້ເກີດຂຶ້ນໃນອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດ, ເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້
meaning list.sentence: The new law brought about significant changes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍ​ສະບັບ​ໃໝ່​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ທີ່​ສຳຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທກັບ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll call you back after the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະໂທຫາເຈົ້າຄືນຫຼັງຈາກກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດ, ປະຕິບັດ (ແຜນການ, ວຽກງານ)
meaning list.sentence: The team carried out the project successfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ, ຫຼຸດລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The prices of houses have come down recently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາເຮືອນໄດ້ຫຼຸດລົງບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໄປ
meaning list.sentence: Please come in and take a seat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເຂົ້າມາແລະນັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ຈະ​ອອກ​ມາ​, ທີ່​ຈະ​ຈັດ​ພີມ​ມາ​
meaning list.sentence: Her new book will come out next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມໃຫມ່ຂອງລາວຈະອອກໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກມາ (ຄວາມຈິງ)
meaning list.sentence: The truth finally came out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຈິງໄດ້ປະກົດອອກມາໃນທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍາເລັດສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ, ກາຍເປັນຄວາມຈິງ
meaning list.sentence: The funding for the project came through in time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເງິນທຶນສໍາລັບໂຄງການໄດ້ຖືກສະຫນອງໃຫ້ທັນເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນ, ຕັດ
meaning list.sentence: We need to cut back on expenses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການໃຊ້ຈ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງໂດຍບໍ່ໄດ້ປະກາດ
meaning list.sentence: Feel free to drop in anytime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດຢຸດໄດ້ທຸກຄັ້ງທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ບາງ​ຄົນ / ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ​
meaning list.sentence: I’ll drop you off at the airport.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະເອົາເຈົ້າໄປຢູ່ສະໜາມບິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອນຫລັບ
meaning list.sentence: He dropped off while watching TV.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວນອນຫລັບໃນຂະນະທີ່ເບິ່ງໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກຢູ່ຫລັງ
meaning list.sentence: He fell behind in his studies after missing school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕົກຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນຂອງລາວຫຼັງຈາກຂາດໂຮງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກຢູ່ໃນຄວາມຮັກ
meaning list.sentence: He fell for her the moment he saw her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕົກຫລຸມຮັກກັບນາງຕອນທີ່ລາວເຫັນນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈະຖືກຫລອກລວງ
meaning list.sentence: She fell for the scam and lost her money.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕົກສໍາລັບການຫລອກລວງແລະສູນເສຍເງິນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະຫນອງຂໍ້ມູນ, ການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນ (ແບບຟອມ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: Please fill in this form with your details.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ແບບຟອມນີ້ດ້ວຍຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນ (ແບບຟອມ, ເອກະສານ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: She filled out the application for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕື່ມແບບຟອມສະໝັກວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: I got back from vacation yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍກັບມາຈາກວັນພັກມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຄຸ້ມ​ຄອງ​, ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ໂດຍ​
meaning list.sentence: I can get by with the little money I earn.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສາມາດຫາໄດ້ດ້ວຍເງິນພຽງເລັກນ້ອຍທີ່ຂ້ອຍຫາໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ demoralize, upset
meaning list.sentence: Don’t let this failure get you down.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າປ່ອຍໃຫ້ຄວາມລົ້ມເຫລວນີ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ທ່ານຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງໄປ
meaning list.sentence: He got down from the ladder carefully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລົງຂັ້ນໄດຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຂົ້າໄປ, ມາຮອດບ່ອນໃດບ່ອນໜຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: What time did you get in last night?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າມາຮອດຕອນກາງຄືນມື້ໃດ?

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄວາມສົນໃຈໃນບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ, ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: She got into painting during the lockdown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສົນໃຈໃນການແຕ້ມຮູບໃນລະຫວ່າງການກັກກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໄປໃນສະຖານທີ່ (ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ, ຍານພາຫະນະ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: He got into a good university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັບ​ເຄື່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: She got on the bus near her house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຂຶ້ນ​ລົດ​ເມ​ຈາກ​ບ່ອນ​ຈອດ​ລົດ​ໃກ້​ເຮືອນ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າກັນໄດ້ດີ
meaning list.sentence: They get on well despite their differences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງຂອງພວກເຂົາ, ພວກເຂົາເຂົ້າກັນໄດ້ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: She gave back the borrowed book.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄືນປື້ມທີ່ລາວຢືມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: I want to go back to my hometown someday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ໜຶ່ງຂ້ອຍຢາກກັບໄປບ້ານເກີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ (ລະເບີດ), ແຫວນ (ປຸກ)
meaning list.sentence: The alarm went off at 6 a.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂມງປຸກໄດ້ປິດລົງໃນເວລາ 6 ໂມງເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດ​ອາຫານ
meaning list.sentence: The milk went off because it was left outside.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົມ​ເສື່ອມ​ເພາະ​ມັນ​ປະ​ໄວ້​ຂ້າງ​ນອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກໄປ
meaning list.sentence: We decided to go out for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕັດສິນໃຈອອກໄປກິນເຂົ້າແລງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກໄປ (ໄຟ, ໄຟ)
meaning list.sentence: The fire went out because there was no wood left.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟ​ໄດ້​ດັບ​ໄປ​ຍ້ອນ​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ໄມ້​ທີ່​ເຫຼືອ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານສະຖານະການທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: She went through a lot of challenges last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຜ່ານສິ່ງທ້າທາຍຫຼາຍຢ່າງໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ກວດ​ສອບ​, ການ​ທົບ​ທວນ​ຄືນ​
meaning list.sentence: Let’s go through the report together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍໃຫ້ທົບທວນບົດລາຍງານຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍວາງບາງອັນເມື່ອເຈົ້າໃຫຍ່ຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: He grew out of his bad habits as he got older.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອ​ລາວ​ໃຫຍ່​ຂຶ້ນ ລາວ​ໄດ້​ປະຖິ້ມ​ນິໄສ​ທີ່​ບໍ່​ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ​ນຸ່ງ​ຫົ່ມ​ເພາະ​ວ່າ​ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ outgrown
meaning list.sentence: She grew out of her old clothes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ເຫມາະກັບເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງເກົ່າຂອງລາວອີກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Please hand in your assignments by Friday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາສົ່ງວຽກຂອງເຈົ້າພາຍໃນວັນສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຈັດການກັບ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher handed out the exam papers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູແຈກຢາຍເອກະສານສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດຄືນ, ຍຶດຄືນ, ຂັດຂວາງ
meaning list.sentence: She tried to hold back her tears during the speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ອົດ​ກັ້ນ​ນ້ຳ​ຕາ​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຮັກສາຈັງຫວະ, ຮັກສາຈັງຫວະ
meaning list.sentence: It’s hard to keep up with the latest technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຍາກທີ່ຈະຮັກສາເຕັກໂນໂລຊີຫລ້າສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກເວັ້ນ, ຍົກເວັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: You shouldn’t leave out important details.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານບໍ່ຄວນຂ້າມລາຍລະອຽດທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: I won’t let you down, I promise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະບໍ່ເຮັດໃຫ້ເຈົ້າຜິດຫວັງ, ຂ້ອຍສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາເຂົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: She let me in when it started raining.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເມື່ອ​ຝົນ​ເລີ່ມ​ຕົກ, ລາວ​ພາ​ຂ້ອຍ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບິ່ງຄືນ, ຈື່
meaning list.sentence: When I look back on my childhood, I feel nostalgic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອຂ້າພະເຈົ້າເບິ່ງໃນໄວເດັກຂອງຂ້າພະເຈົ້າ, ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຮູ້ສຶກ nostalgic.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາໃຈໃສ່
meaning list.sentence: Look out! There’s a car coming.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະວັງ! ລົດກຳລັງມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍ້າຍເຂົ້າໄປໃນເຮືອນ
meaning list.sentence: We’re planning to move in next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາກໍາລັງວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຍ້າຍອອກໄປໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍ້າຍ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ເຮືອນ​
meaning list.sentence: She moved out of her apartment last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍ້າຍອອກຈາກຫ້ອງແຖວຂອງລາວໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງ (ລົດ)
meaning list.sentence: The police signaled us to pull over.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ສົ່ງ​ສັນຍານ​ໃຫ້​ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ຖອນ​ຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: extinguish (ໄຟ, conflagration)
meaning list.sentence: They quickly put out the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ດັບໄຟຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຫນີ, ຫນີ
meaning list.sentence: He ran away from home when he was young.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ແລ່ນ​ໜີ​ຈາກ​ບ້ານ​ຕອນ​ທີ່​ລາວ​ຍັງ​ນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ່ນກັບຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: She ran back to the house to get her keys.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແລ່ນກັບຄືນໄປເຮືອນເພື່ອເອົາກະແຈຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັ່ນປ່ວນ
meaning list.sentence: The driver accidentally ran over a cat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນຂັບລົດບັງເອີນແລ່ນຂ້າມແມວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍານົດໄປ
meaning list.sentence: We set off early to avoid traffic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ອອກ​ໄປ​ໄວ​ເພື່ອ​ຫຼີກ​ເວັ້ນ​ການ​ຈະ​ລາ​ຈອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ (ລະເບີດ, ບັ້ງໄຟດອກ)
meaning list.sentence: They set off fireworks during the celebration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຈູດບັ້ງໄຟດອກໃນລະຫວ່າງການສະເຫຼີມສະຫຼອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍານົດ, ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: We set out on a journey to explore the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ໄປ​ສໍາ​ຫຼວດ​ພູ​ເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດ​ປະ​ສົງ​, ແຜນ​ການ​
meaning list.sentence: She set out to write a novel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັ້ງໃຈຈະຂຽນນິຍາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ຈະ​ເກີດ​ຂຶ້ນ​, ທີ່​ຈະ​ມາ​
meaning list.sentence: He didn’t show up for the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ໄດ້ມາປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Please sit down and relax.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນານັ່ງລົງແລະຜ່ອນຄາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວົ້າອອກມາດັງໆ
meaning list.sentence: Can you speak up? I can’t hear you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຈະຍົກສຽງຂອງເຈົ້າບໍ? ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ຍິນເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວົ້າ​ຄວາມ​ຄິດ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ຢ່າງ​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​
meaning list.sentence: You need to speak up if something bothers you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າມີບາງຢ່າງລົບກວນເຈົ້າ, ເຈົ້າຄວນເວົ້າຢ່າງເປີດເຜີຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ (ຄວາມ​ສໍາ​ພັນ​, ກຸ່ມ​)
meaning list.sentence: They decided to split up after 10 years together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ຢູ່​ຮ່ວມ​ກັນ​ເປັນ​ສິບ​ປີ​, ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ແຍກ​ອອກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ນອນເດິກ
meaning list.sentence: I stayed up late to finish the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍນອນເດິກເພື່ອຈະສຳເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຊກແຊງ, ແຊກແຊງ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher had to step in to stop the argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູຕ້ອງກ້າວເຂົ້າໄປເພື່ອຢຸດການໂຕ້ຖຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກໄປໃນເວລາສັ້ນໆ
meaning list.sentence: I need to step out for a moment to take a call.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງອອກໄປໄລຍະສັ້ນເພື່ອໂທຫາໂທລະສັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ຈະ​ຮັກ​ສາ​ຄວາມ​ສັດ​ຊື່​, ຄວາມ​ສັດ​ຊື່​
meaning list.sentence: If you stick to the plan, everything will work out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າທ່ານຍຶດຫມັ້ນໃນແຜນການ, ທຸກສິ່ງທຸກຢ່າງຈະໄປດ້ວຍດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິດ (ເຄື່ອງ​ມື​ໄຟ​ຟ້າ​)
meaning list.sentence: Don’t forget to switch off the lights before you leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າລືມປິດໄຟກ່ອນອອກເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນ​ເອົາ​ຄວາມ​ສົນ​ໃຈ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​, ການ​ພັກ​ຜ່ອນ​
meaning list.sentence: I need to switch off for a while after work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງພັກຜ່ອນຈິດໃຈຂອງຂ້ອຍສໍາລັບໄລຍະຫນຶ່ງຫຼັງຈາກເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດ (ເຄື່ອງ​ມື​ໄຟ​ຟ້າ​)
meaning list.sentence: He switched on the TV to watch the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປີດໂທລະທັດເພື່ອເບິ່ງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນທຶກ
meaning list.sentence: Did you take down the notes from the lecture?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າເອົາບັນທຶກຂອງເຈົ້າຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ຈະຮື້ຖອນ, ເອົາລົງ
meaning list.sentence: They took down the old building last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ທຳລາຍ​ຕຶກ​ເກົ່າ​ໃນ​ປີ​ກາຍ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໃຈ, ຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: It was difficult to take in all the information at once.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຍາກທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໃຈຂໍ້ມູນທັງຫມົດໃນເວລາດຽວກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນເຈົ້າພາບ
meaning list.sentence: They took in a stray dog during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເປັນເຈົ້າພາບຫມາ stray ໃນໄລຍະພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບ
meaning list.sentence: She took out a pen to sign the document.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາປາກກາອອກເພື່ອເຊັນເອກະສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາອອກ (ກິນ)
meaning list.sentence: We ordered pizza to take out last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາພວກເຮົາໄດ້ສັ່ງ pizza ຈາກພາຍນອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຶກສາຫາລື, ແກ້ໄຂໂດຍການໂອ້ລົມ
meaning list.sentence: Let’s talk over the problem before making a decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ເຮົາແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາໂດຍການລົມກັນກ່ອນຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ
meaning list.sentence: The dog tore apart the newspaper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາໄດ້ຈີກຫນັງສືພິມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອທໍາລາຍ, ທໍາລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The tragic news tore the family apart.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ທີ່​ໂສກ​ເສົ້າ​ໄດ້​ທຳລາຍ​ຄອບຄົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: She told him off for being late again.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງ​ໄດ້​ດ່າ​ລາວ​ວ່າ​ມາ​ຊ້າ​ອີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮາກ
meaning list.sentence: He threw up after eating spoiled food.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮາກຫຼັງຈາກກິນອາຫານທີ່ເສື່ອມເສຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: She turned around when she heard her name.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຫັນ​ມາ​ເມື່ອ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຍິນ​ຊື່​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ສະ​ຖາ​ນະ​ການ​, ກັບ​ຄືນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​ມັນ​
meaning list.sentence: The company turned around its losses in a year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປ່ຽນຄືນການສູນເສຍຂອງຕົນພາຍໃນຫນຶ່ງປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບ​ຄືນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​, ກັບ​ຄືນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​
meaning list.sentence: We had to turn back because of the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງກັບຄືນຍ້ອນພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: He turned over the page to read more.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫັນຫນ້າເພື່ອອ່ານເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: They turned over the documents to the authorities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ມອບ​ເອກະສານ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ເຈົ້າ​ໜ້າ​ທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ລໍຖ້າ
meaning list.sentence: We’re waiting for the bus to arrive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາລໍຖ້າລົດເມມາຮອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ, ໄປ
meaning list.sentence: He walked away without saying a word.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍ່າງຫນີໄປໂດຍບໍ່ມີຄໍາເວົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອງປະຊຸມ, ບົດຮຽນ, ແລະອື່ນໆ. ການປະຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: Several workers walked out during the protest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານຫຼາຍຄົນໄດ້ຍ່າງອອກຈາກວຽກ ໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດວຽກຢູ່
meaning list.sentence: She’s working on a new project for school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກໃນໂຄງການໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບໂຮງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້​ໄຂ​, ເອົາ​ຊະ​ນະ​
meaning list.sentence: We’ll work through the problem together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈະເອົາຊະນະບັນຫາຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນີ, ອອກ
meaning list.sentence: The prisoner managed to break away from the guards.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂທດສາມາດຫລົບຫນີຈາກກອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກຈາກກຸ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: Some members decided to break away and form their own club.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະມາຊິກບາງຄົນໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈອອກໄປ ແລະເລີ່ມສະໂມສອນຂອງຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ​ຊະ​ນະ​ອຸ​ປະ​ສັກ​, ບັນ​ລຸ​ຜົນ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ​ທີ່​ຍິ່ງ​ໃຫຍ່​
meaning list.sentence: The scientist broke through with a new discovery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດອັນຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ດ້ວຍການຄົ້ນພົບໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ແນະນຳ, ຮັບສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: The company brought in new employees this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຈ້າງພະນັກງານໃຫມ່ໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງລາຍຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: The new product brought in a lot of revenue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ສ້າງລາຍຮັບຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​, ການ​ນໍາ​ເຂົ້າ​ຕະ​ຫຼາດ​
meaning list.sentence: The company brought out a new smartphone model.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເປີດຕົວຮຸ່ນໂທລະສັບສະຫຼາດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທ, ເຊີນ
meaning list.sentence: They called in an expert to solve the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ໂທຫາຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດກັບ
meaning list.sentence: He got carried away while talking about his achievements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເວົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ຄວາມ​ສຳເລັດ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊັກອິນ (ໂຮງແຮມ, ສະຫນາມບິນ)
meaning list.sentence: We checked in at the hotel late last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໃນ​ໂຮງ​ແຮມ​ໃນ​ຕອນ​ກາງ​ຄືນ​ທີ່​ຜ່ານ​ມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊັກເອົ້າ (ໂຮງແຮມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need to check out of the hotel by noon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງເຊັກເອົາອອກຈາກໂຮງແຮມໃນຕອນທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອກວດກາເບິ່ງ, ພິຈາລະນາ
meaning list.sentence: You should check out this new book.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນກວດເບິ່ງຫນັງສືໃຫມ່ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ຽມຢາມ
meaning list.sentence: She comes around to visit us every Sunday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມາຢາມພວກເຮົາທຸກໆວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟື້ນຟູສະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: He fainted, but he came around quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ສະ​ໝອງ, ແຕ່​ໄດ້​ສະ​ຕິ​ຄືນ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: She came back from her trip yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກັບຄືນມາຈາກການເດີນທາງຂອງລາວມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈັບປ່ວຍ
meaning list.sentence: He came down with the flu last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕິດໄຂ້ຫວັດໃຫຍ່ໃນອາທິດແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ມາ!, ດ່ວນ
meaning list.sentence: Come on, we’re going to be late!
meaning list.sentence translation: ມາ, ພວກເຮົາກໍາລັງຈະຊ້າ!

meaning list.meaning: ເລີ່ມເຮັດວຽກ (ເຄື່ອງ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: The lights suddenly came on.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັນທີທັນໃດແສງໄຟໄດ້ມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: If you’re going out tonight, count me in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າເຈົ້າຈະອອກໄປຄືນນີ້, ຮວມຂ້ອຍນຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດຜ່ອນ, ຕັດ
meaning list.sentence: He’s trying to cut down on sugar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາຍາມຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການບໍລິໂພກ້ໍາຕານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດຕົ້ນໄມ້
meaning list.sentence: They cut down the old oak tree in the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດຕົ້ນໂອກເກົ່າຢູ່ໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້ອມ​ແປງ​ໃຫມ່​
meaning list.sentence: They are doing up the old house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າກໍາລັງປັບປຸງເຮືອນເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: to tie, to fasten
meaning list.sentence: He did up his coat because it was cold.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ກະ​ຕຸ້ນ​ເສື້ອ​ຄຸມ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ເພາະ​ມັນ​ໜາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດຕັ້ງ, ການກະກຽມ (ເອກະສານ, ແຜນການ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer drew up the contract.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຍຄວາມກະກຽມສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດ (ຍານພາຫະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: A car drew up outside the house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດຄັນໜຶ່ງຢຸດຢູ່ໜ້າເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຢຸດໂດຍ, ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມໄລຍະສັ້ນໆ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll drop by your office tomorrow afternoon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະຢຸດຢູ່ຫ້ອງການຂອງເຈົ້າໃນຕອນບ່າຍມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກ
meaning list.sentence: She fell down the stairs and hurt her ankle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລົ້ມລົງຂັ້ນໄດ ແລະເຈັບຂໍ້ຕີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ມເຫລວ
meaning list.sentence: The plan fell down because of poor management.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການດັ່ງກ່າວລົ້ມເຫລວເນື່ອງຈາກການຈັດການຜິດພາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກ, ລົ້ມລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The painting fell off the wall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແຕ້ມໄດ້ຕົກລົງຈາກຝາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ
meaning list.sentence: Sales have fallen off during the winter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂາຍຫຼຸດລົງໃນໄລຍະລະດູຫນາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈ, ຮູ້ສຶກໂສກເສົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: I really feel for her after hearing her story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈແທ້ໆສໍາລັບລາວຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນເລື່ອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອບອກ, ຖ່າຍທອດ
meaning list.sentence: He struggled to get his point across.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກໃນການສະແດງຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫມາຍເຖິງ, ຫມາຍຄວາມວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: What exactly are you getting at?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫມາຍຄວາມວ່າແນວໃດ?

meaning list.meaning: ອອກເດີນທາງ (ລົດເມ, ລົດໄຟ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: We need to get off at the next station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງລົງຈາກສະຖານີຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນີໄປກັບມັນ
meaning list.sentence: He got off without any punishment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ໜີ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ການ​ລົງໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຊະນະ, ບັນລຸ
meaning list.sentence: We will get through these tough times together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈະຜ່ານຜ່າຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກເຫຼົ່ານີ້ຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕໍ່ທາງໂທລະສັບ
meaning list.sentence: I couldn’t get through to him all day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າຫາລາວໝົດມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍອອກມາ (ກິ່ນ, ແສງສະຫວ່າງ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: The flowers give off a pleasant fragrance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດອກໄມ້ສົ່ງກິ່ນຫອມທີ່ ໜ້າ ຍິນດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ​ກັບ​, ໄປ​ຮ່ວມ​ກັນ​
meaning list.sentence: I’ll go along with you to the store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະໄປຮ້ານນຳເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ, ອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll go along with your idea for now.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຫັນດີກັບຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງເຈົ້າໃນເວລານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານໄປ (ເວລາ, ໂອກາດ)
meaning list.sentence: Years go by so quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີຜ່ານໄປຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະຕິບັດບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: We should go by the rules.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງປະຕິບັດຕາມກົດລະບຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ, ຫຼຸດລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The temperature will go down tonight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມຈະຫຼຸດລົງໃນຄືນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັດຂ້ອງ (ລະບົບ, ອິນເຕີເນັດ ແລະ ອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: The server went down during the update.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊີບເວີຂັດຂ້ອງໃນລະຫວ່າງການອັບເດດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມ​ຂຶ້ນ​, ເພີ່ມ​ຂຶ້ນ​
meaning list.sentence: The prices of fuel have gone up recently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄານໍ້າມັນໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ລຸກຂຶ້ນ, ອອກໄປ (ອາຄານ, ໄຟ, ແລະອື່ນໆ).
meaning list.sentence: A cheer went up from the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເບີກບານໃຈໄດ້ລຸກຂຶ້ນຈາກຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລໍຖ້າ
meaning list.sentence: Hang on for a minute, I’ll be right back.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລໍຖ້ານາທີ, ຂ້ອຍຈະກັບຄືນມາທັນທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດແຫນ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: Hang on tight! The ride is about to start.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍຶດແໜ້ນ! ການເດີນທາງແມ່ນກ່ຽວກັບການເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງສາຍໂທລະສັບ
meaning list.sentence: He hung up before I could say goodbye.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງໂທລະສັບກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເວົ້າລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂວນ (ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: Please hang up your coat in the closet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາແຂວນເສື້ອຄຸມຂອງເຈົ້າຢູ່ໃນຕູ້ເສື້ອຜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The traffic held us up for hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈະລາຈອນຊັກຊ້າພວກເຮົາເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະທຳການລັກລອບ
meaning list.sentence: The robbers held up the bank yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນປຸ້ນທະນາຄານມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັກ​ສາ​ໄວ້​, ໃຫ້​ຫ່າງ​ໄກ​ສອກ​ຫຼີກ​
meaning list.sentence: Keep away from that dog; it might bite you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢູ່ຫ່າງຈາກຫມານັ້ນ; ມັນອາດຈະກັດເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ໃຫ້ເຂົ້າ, ເພື່ອຮັກສາອອກ
meaning list.sentence: This area is dangerous, so keep out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ນີ້ເປັນອັນຕະລາຍ, ສະນັ້ນຢ່າເຂົ້າໄປໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລີກວຽກ, ເລີກວຽກ
meaning list.sentence: Let’s knock off early today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ນີ້ອອກໄປວຽກກ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ມ, ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally knocked off the vase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕົກ​ກະ​ກັນ​ໂດຍ​ບັງ​ເອີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ, ອອກ
meaning list.sentence: He laid down his tools and took a break.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງເຄື່ອງມືຂອງລາວລົງແລະພັກຜ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ກົດ​ລະ​ບຽບ​
meaning list.sentence: The manager laid down new rules for the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການກໍານົດກົດລະບຽບໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງອອກ
meaning list.sentence: The company had to lay off workers due to financial losses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດ​ຕ້ອງ​ປົດ​ຄົນ​ງານ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ການ​ເສຍ​ເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ອະໄພ, ບໍ່ແມ່ນການລົງໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher let him off with just a warning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ​ອາ​ຈານ​ໄດ້​ອະ​ໄພ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົາ​ມີ​ພຽງ​ແຕ່​ການ​ເຕືອນ​ໄພ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເບີດ (ດອກໄມ້ໄຟ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: They let off fireworks to celebrate the New Year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຈູດ​ບັ້ງ​ໄຟ​ດອກ​ເພື່ອ​ສະຫຼອງ​ປີ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ນອນ, ນອນ
meaning list.sentence: I need to lie down for a while; I feel tired.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງນອນຢູ່ຊົ່ວຄາວ; ຂ້ອຍຮູ້ສຶກເມື່ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ອງແສງ, ສ່ອງແສງ
meaning list.sentence: The fireworks lit up the night sky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດອກໄຟຈູດຂຶ້ນທ້ອງຟ້າຕອນກາງຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູດຢາສູບ
meaning list.sentence: He lit up a cigarette after dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຄ່ໍາເຂົາຈູດຢາສູບ.

meaning list.meaning: to line up, to line up
meaning list.sentence: The students lined up outside the classroom.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນແຖວໜ້າຢູ່ນອກຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດໍາລົງຊີວິດ
meaning list.sentence: He lives on a small pension.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢູ່ລອດໃນເງິນບໍານານຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ດໍາລົງຊີວິດກັບບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ, ເພື່ອຮັກສາທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ
meaning list.sentence: Her memory will live on forever.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊົງຈໍາຂອງລາວຈະມີຊີວິດຢູ່ຕະຫຼອດໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບິ່ງຮອບໆ
meaning list.sentence: We looked around the new house before buying it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ເຮືອນ​ໃຫມ່​ກ່ອນ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຊື້​ມັນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ທົບ​ທວນ​ຄືນ​, ການ​ກວດ​ສອບ​
meaning list.sentence: Can you look over my report before I submit it?
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດກວດເບິ່ງບົດລາຍງານກ່ອນທີ່ຈະສົ່ງມັນບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຊົມເຊີຍ, ເຄົາລົບ
meaning list.sentence: He looks up to his older brother as a role model.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຫັນອ້າຍຂອງລາວເປັນແບບຢ່າງແລະຊົມເຊີຍລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປບ່ອນໃດບ່ອນໜຶ່ງ, ໄປບ່ອນໃດບ່ອນໜຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: We made for the exit as soon as the movie ended.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັນທີທີ່ຮູບເງົາສິ້ນສຸດລົງ, ພວກເຮົາມຸ່ງຫນ້າໄປສູ່ທາງອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າ, ສືບຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: After discussing the first point, let’s move on to the next topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກສົນທະນາຫົວຂໍ້ທໍາອິດ, ໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາກ້າວໄປສູ່ຫົວຂໍ້ຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວຕໍ່ໄປກັບຊີວິດຂອງເຈົ້າ (ຫຼັງຈາກສະຖານະການທີ່ບໍ່ດີ)
meaning list.sentence: It’s time to move on from the past.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເຖິງເວລາທີ່ຈະປ່ອຍອະດີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານໄປ
meaning list.sentence: We passed by the park on our way home.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຜ່ານ​ສວນ​ສາ​ທາ​ລະ​ນະ​ໃນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ກັບ​ບ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: passage ຂອງ​ເວ​ລາ​
meaning list.sentence: Years seem to pass by so quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີເບິ່ງຄືວ່າຜ່ານໄປຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈ່າຍຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: I will pay you back the money next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະຈ່າຍເງິນຄືນໃຫ້ເຈົ້າໃນອາທິດໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ແຄ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: He swore to pay back those who betrayed him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ສາບານ​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ແກ້ແຄ້ນ​ຜູ້​ທີ່​ທໍລະຍົດ​ຕໍ່​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊໍາລະຫນີ້ສິນຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່
meaning list.sentence: She finally paid off her student loans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທີ່ສຸດລາວໄດ້ຊໍາລະເງິນກູ້ຢືມຂອງນັກຮຽນຂອງລາວຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນ (ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: All of his hard work paid off when he got the promotion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກທັງຫມົດຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບຜົນຕອບແທນດ້ວຍການສົ່ງເສີມ.

meaning list.meaning: to torment , ເພື່ອ tease
meaning list.sentence: The older kids always pick on him at school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກ​ນ້ອຍ​ໃຫຍ່​ຢູ່​ໂຮງ​ຮຽນ​ມັກ​ເລືອກ​ເອົາ​ເຂົາ​.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຫລີກໄປທາງຫນຶ່ງ, ເພື່ອສະສົມ
meaning list.sentence: He puts aside some money every month for his trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຫຍັດເງິນຈໍານວນຫນຶ່ງໃນແຕ່ລະເດືອນສໍາລັບການເດີນທາງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື່ອນ​ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ໃນ​ຂະ​ນະ​ທີ່​
meaning list.sentence: Let’s put aside our differences and work together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາເອົາຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງຂອງພວກເຮົາຫລີກໄປທາງຫນຶ່ງແລະເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຕ້ອນຮັບຜູ້ໃດຜູ້ນຶ່ງ, ເປັນເຈົ້າພາບຜູ້ໃດຜູ້ນຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: They put us up for the night when we missed the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນເວລາທີ່ພວກເຮົາພາດລົດໄຟ, ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕ້ອນຮັບພວກເຮົາຄືນຫນຶ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ກໍ່​ສ້າງ​, ການ​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ຂຶ້ນ​
meaning list.sentence: They are putting up a new building downtown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າກຳລັງສ້າງຕຶກໃໝ່ຢູ່ໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອລົບລ້າງຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້, ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The police ruled out robbery as a motive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳ​ຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ການ​ລັກ​ລອບ​ເປັນ​ເຫດ​ຈູງ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອແລ່ນຕາມ, ປະຕິບັດຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: The dog ran after the ball.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາແລ່ນຕາມບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມທີ່ຈະໄດ້ຮັບບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He’s always running after fame and fortune.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແມ່ນສະ ເໝີ ໄປຕາມຊື່ສຽງແລະຄວາມໂຊກດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ, ໄປ (ໂດຍສະເພາະແມ່ນເວົ້າກັບເດັກນ້ອຍ)
meaning list.sentence: Run along now, kids. It's time for bed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມາເດີ້ພວກທ່ານ, ໄປດຽວນີ້. ມັນເຖິງເວລານອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີຄົນ (ດ້ວຍພາຫະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: He was almost run down by a speeding car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດ​ຄັນ​ນຶ່ງ​ແລ່ນ​ໄວ​ເກືອບ​ຕຳ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕຳນິ, ຕຳນິ
meaning list.sentence: He’s always running his colleagues down.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກວິພາກວິຈານເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູນເສຍພະລັງງານ (drum, ອຸປະກອນ)
meaning list.sentence: The battery has run down; we need to recharge it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມໍ້ໄຟແມ່ນຕາຍ; ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງການເພີ່ມມູນຄ່າໂທ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງຄົນໄປ
meaning list.sentence: We went to the airport to see him off.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄປສະຫນາມບິນເພື່ອເບິ່ງລາວອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: I had to send back the shoes because they didn’t fit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງສົ່ງມັນຄືນເພາະວ່າເກີບບໍ່ເຫມາະ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທຫາ, ເອົາມາໃຫ້
meaning list.sentence: We sent for the doctor immediately.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໂທຫາທ່ານຫມໍທັນທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສົ່ງ (ຂໍ້ຄວາມ, ປະກາດ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: They sent out invitations for the wedding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສົ່ງ​ອອກ​ຄໍາ​ເຊື້ອ​ເຊີນ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ wedding ໄດ້​.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຽນ, ບັນທຶກ
meaning list.sentence: The rules were set down clearly in the document.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດລະບຽບໄດ້ຖືກຂຽນຢ່າງຊັດເຈນຢູ່ໃນເອກະສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັບ​ຄົນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​ໃດ​ຫນຶ່ງ (ໂດຍ​ຍານ​ພາ​ຫະ​ນະ​)
meaning list.sentence: The driver set me down at the corner of the street.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນຂັບລົດຖິ້ມຂ້ອຍລົງທີ່ແຈຂອງຖະຫນົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍານົດໄປ
meaning list.sentence: They set forth on their journey early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າອອກເດີນທາງແຕ່ເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອອະທິບາຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: He set forth his plans during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະກາດແຜນການຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບລົງ, ສະຫງົບລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The children finally settled down after a long day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທີ່ສຸດ ເດັກນ້ອຍກໍ່ສະຫງົບລົງ ຫຼັງຈາກມື້ທີ່ຍາວນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຕັ້ງ​ຖິ່ນ​ຖານ​, ການ​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ຄໍາ​ສັ່ງ​
meaning list.sentence: They moved to the countryside to settle down.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ຊົນນະບົດເພື່ອຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊີນຄົນໃນ
meaning list.sentence: The assistant showed the guests in to the meeting room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍຕ້ອນຮັບແຂກເຂົ້າຫ້ອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: to be silence , silence
meaning list.sentence: He told them to shut up during the movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບອກພວກເຂົາໃຫ້ປິດສຽງໃນລະຫວ່າງຮູບເງົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ່ງຕັ້ງຊື່
meaning list.sentence: Sit up straight and pay attention!
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັ່ງຊື່ແລະເອົາໃຈໃສ່!

meaning list.meaning: ນອນເດິກ
meaning list.sentence: We sat up late talking about old times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ນອນ​ເດິກ​ເວົ້າ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ສະ​ໄໝ​ເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວົ້າ​ຄວາມ​ຄິດ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ຢ່າງ​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​
meaning list.sentence: She spoke out against the unfair treatment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເວົ້າຢ່າງເປີດເຜີຍຕໍ່ກັບການປະຕິບັດທີ່ບໍ່ຍຸດຕິທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: hibernate
meaning list.sentence: The rescue team is standing by in case of emergency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໜ່ວຍ​ກູ້​ໄພ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ສະ​ແຕນ​ບາຍ​ເຫດ​ສຸກ​ເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ, ທີ່ຈະຢູ່ກັບ
meaning list.sentence: She stood by her friend during the difficult times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢືນຢູ່ຂ້າງເພື່ອນຂອງລາວໃນຊ່ວງເວລາທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເປັນຕົວແທນ, ຫມາຍຄວາມວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: What does the abbreviation 'UN' stand for?
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວຫຍໍ້ 'UN' ເປັນຕົວແທນແນວໃດ?

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ, ປ້ອງກັນ
meaning list.sentence: She stands for equality and justice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະໜັບສະໜູນຄວາມສະເໝີພາບແລະຄວາມຍຸຕິທຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທນ, ແທນ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll stand in for my colleague while she's on leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃຫ້ໝູ່ຂອງຂ້ອຍໃນຂະນະທີ່ລາວອອກເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢືນຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: Please stand up when the national anthem is played.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢືນຂຶ້ນເມື່ອເພງຊາດຖືກຫຼີ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປ້ອງກັນ, ຕ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: You should stand up for your rights.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງປົກປ້ອງສິດທິຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: His bright red jacket made him stick out in the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສື້ອແຈັກເກັດສີແດງສົດໃສຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວໂດດເດັ່ນໃນຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫຍາຍອອກ
meaning list.sentence: He stuck out his tongue playfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕິດລີ້ນຂອງລາວຢ່າງຫຼິ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຫ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He took apart the engine to fix it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ເຄື່ອງ​ຈັກ​ອອກ​ມາ​ເພື່ອ​ສ້ອມ​ແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: I need to take back the shoes I bought yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ຄືນເກີບທີ່ຂ້ອຍຊື້ມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ ຄຳ ເວົ້າຂອງເຈົ້າຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: He had to take back what he said.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕ້ອງເອົາຄືນສິ່ງທີ່ລາວເວົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ວຽກອະດິເລກ, ອາຊີບ)
meaning list.sentence: She took up painting during the lockdown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເລີ່ມແຕ້ມຮູບໃນລະຫວ່າງການກັກກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຊ້​ເວ​ລາ​ຫຼື​ຊ່ອງ​ຫວ່າງ​
meaning list.sentence: This table takes up too much space.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕາຕະລາງນີ້ໃຊ້ພື້ນທີ່ຫຼາຍເກີນໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ​ຕອບ​ໂຕ້​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ເຄົາລົບ, ຕອບ​ໂຕ້​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ເຄົາລົບ
meaning list.sentence: Don’t talk back to your teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າ​ຕອບ​ສະ​ໜອງ​ຄູ​ອາ​ຈານ​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ສຸ​ພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຊັກຊວນ
meaning list.sentence: He talked me into buying a new car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊັກຊວນໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍຊື້ລົດໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມແພ້
meaning list.sentence: She talked me out of quitting my job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເວົ້າ​ໃຫ້​ຂ້ອຍ​ເຊົາ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຮື້​ຖອນ​, ການ​ລົບ​ລ້າງ​
meaning list.sentence: They tore down the old building to build a mall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຮື້ຖອນຕຶກເກົ່າເພື່ອສ້າງສູນການຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: Chew
meaning list.sentence: I need some time to think over your proposal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງການເວລາຄິດກ່ຽວກັບການສະເຫນີຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He threw out the old magazines.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖິ້ມວາລະສານເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຟໄຫມ້ຄົນ
meaning list.sentence: They were thrown out of the restaurant for misbehaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຖືກໄລ່ອອກຈາກຮ້ານອາຫານຍ້ອນພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຊື່ອມຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: He tied up the package with string.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັດຊຸດດ້ວຍເຊືອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຫວ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: I was tied up in meetings all day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຫຍຸ້ງຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມໝົດມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ (ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງ, ເກີບ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: She tried on the dress but didn’t buy it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງພະຍາຍາມສຸດ dress ແຕ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ຊື້ມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ, ການທົດສອບ
meaning list.sentence: You should try out the new software.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນພະຍາຍາມຊອບແວໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນໄປຫາໃຜຜູ້ຫນຶ່ງ, ຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ
meaning list.sentence: She turned to her friends for support.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫັນໄປຫາຫມູ່ເພື່ອນຂອງລາວເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸມໃສ່ຫົວຂໍ້ໃດຫນຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Let’s turn to the next chapter now.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕອນນີ້ໃຫ້ເຮົາກ້າວໄປສູ່ພາກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຮັບໃຊ້, ຮັບໃຊ້
meaning list.sentence: The waiter waited on us quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: waiter ໄດ້ຮັບໃຊ້ພວກເຮົາຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໄປ
meaning list.sentence: She walked in without knocking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ເຄາະ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ
meaning list.sentence: He got angry and walked off.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຈຮ້າຍແລະຍ່າງຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປບາງບ່ອນໂດຍການຍ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll walk over to your place later.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນ, ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຈະໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມທ່ານດ້ວຍຕີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕໍ່ບາງຄົນທີ່ບໍ່ດີ
meaning list.sentence: Don’t let people walk over you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າປ່ອຍໃຫ້ຄົນປະຕິບັດຕໍ່ເຈົ້າບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: to warm up , to warm up
meaning list.sentence: The athletes warmed up before the race.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ກິລາ​ໄດ້​ອອກ​ກຳ​ລັງ​ກາຍ​ອຸ່ນ​ເຄື່ອງ​ກ່ອນ​ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸ່ນຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: I warmed up some soup for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຮ້ອນແກງສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຝົ້າ​ລະ​ວັງ​, ເພື່ອ​ປົກ​ປັກ​ຮັກ​ສາ​
meaning list.sentence: She watched over her little brother while their parents were out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເຝົ້າເບິ່ງນ້ອງຊາຍຂອງນາງໃນຂະນະທີ່ພໍ່ແມ່ຂອງພວກເຂົາອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບ, ລ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: He wiped off the dust from the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຊັດຂີ້ຝຸ່ນອອກຈາກໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດວຽກຕໍ່ຕ້ານ, ຂັດຂວາງ
meaning list.sentence: The new law works against small businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍໃໝ່ນີ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ກັບທຸລະກິດຂະໜາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັດທະນາ, ກະກຽມ
meaning list.sentence: She worked up the courage to speak in public.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພັດທະນາຄວາມກ້າຫານທີ່ຈະເວົ້າຕໍ່ສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: escalate ສະຖານະການ, ໄດ້ຮັບການໃຈຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: Don't work yourself up over small issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ່າຕີຕົວເອງກັບສິ່ງເລັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖື​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ຄ່າ, ຖື​ວ່າ​ເປັນ​ການ​ສູນ​ເສຍ
meaning list.sentence: The bank wrote off the debt as uncollectable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຄານຖືວ່າໜີ້ສິນບໍ່ສາມາດເກັບໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ລວມຍານພາຫະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The car was written off after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄດ້ທັງໝົດຫຼັງເກີດອຸບັດຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຽນລາຍລະອຽດ
meaning list.sentence: She wrote up a full report of the incident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຂຽນ​ບົດ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ລະອຽດ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ເຫດການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຄໍາແນະນໍາຫຼືຂໍ້ມູນ
meaning list.sentence: The police acted on the anonymous tip they received.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕໍາຫຼວດໄດ້ປະຕິບັດຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ບໍ່ເປີດເຜີຍຊື່ທີ່ພວກເຂົາໄດ້ຮັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະຕິບັດ (ສະຖານະການ, ສະຖານະການ)
meaning list.sentence: The children acted out their favorite stories in class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ສະແດງເລື່ອງລາວທີ່ເຂົາເຈົ້າມັກໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ຮູ້​ສຶກ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​
meaning list.sentence: He acted out his frustration by shouting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລະບາຍຄວາມອຸກອັ່ງໂດຍການຮ້ອງອອກມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຖອນ​ຕົວ​, ຢູ່​ຫ່າງ​ໄກ​
meaning list.sentence: You need to back off and give him some space.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ຈໍາ​ເປັນ​ຕ້ອງ​ໄດ້​ກ້າວ​ກັບ​ຄືນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​ແລະ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົາ​ຊ່ອງ​ບາງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ, ລະເບີດ
meaning list.sentence: The bomb blew up in the middle of the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະ​ເບີດ​ໄດ້​ແຕກ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢູ່​ກາງ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: to get ໃຈ​ຮ້າຍ​
meaning list.sentence: She blew up when she heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຈຮ້າຍເມື່ອໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອີງໃສ່ບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The issue boils down to a lack of communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາແມ່ນມາຈາກການຂາດການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ (ຄວາມ​ສໍາ​ພັນ​, ການ​ຮ່ວມ​ມື​)
meaning list.sentence: They decided to break up after years of being together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ຢູ່​ນໍາ​ກັນ​ຫຼາຍ​ປີ​, ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ແຍກ​ອອກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແຈກຢາຍ (ກຸ່ມ, ກອງປະຊຸມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police broke up the protest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ກະ​ຈາຍ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ມ, ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: The new policies aim to bring down inflation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ເພື່ອ​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຫລຸດຜ່ອນ​ໄພ​ເງິນ​ເຟີ້.

meaning list.meaning: upset, demoralize
meaning list.sentence: The bad news brought everyone down.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວຮ້າຍເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນເສຍໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍາເລັດສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: She brought off the project despite the challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ລາວໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທອອກ, ຮ້ອງອອກມາ
meaning list.sentence: He called out her name in the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝູງຊົນຮ້ອງຊື່ຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍານິຕິຕຽນໃຜຜູ້ຫນຶ່ງ, ໂທຫາຄົນທີ່ຈະບັນຊີ
meaning list.sentence: She called him out for lying.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ວິພາກວິຈານນາງສໍາລັບການຕົວະ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊັກເອົ້າ (ໂຮງແຮມແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: We checked out of the hotel early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາເຊັກເອົາອອກຈາກໂຮງແຮມໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອອະນາໄມ, tidy ຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: We need to clean up the kitchen after dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດເຮືອນຄົວຫຼັງຈາກຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ້າງ​ອາດ​ຊະ​ຍາ​ກໍາ (ການ​ດໍາ​ເນີນ​ງານ​ຕໍາ​ຫຼວດ​)
meaning list.sentence: The authorities are working to clean up crime in the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າ​ໜ້າ​ທີ່​ກຳ​ລັງ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ເພື່ອ​ກຳ​ຈັດ​ອາດ​ຊະ​ຍາ​ກຳ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ເຂດ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ​ນໍາ​ກັນ​, ໄປ​ກັບ​
meaning list.sentence: Would you like to come along with us to the party?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຢາກມາຮ່ວມງານລ້ຽງກັບພວກເຮົາບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມ​ຄືບ​ຫນ້າ​, ພັດ​ທະ​ນາ​
meaning list.sentence: His painting skills have come along nicely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສາມາດໃນການແຕ້ມຂອງລາວພັດທະນາຢ່າງສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກແຍກ, ກະແຈກກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The old chair came apart when he sat on it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເກົ້າອີ້ເກົ່າໄດ້ລົ້ມລົງເມື່ອນາງນັ່ງຢູ່ເທິງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູນເສຍການຄວບຄຸມ, ທໍາລາຍອາລົມ
meaning list.sentence: She came apart after hearing the sad news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈຫຼາຍຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວທີ່ໂສກເສົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນບູລິມະສິດ, ມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນກວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: Family should always come before work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບຄົວຄວນມາກ່ອນເຮັດວຽກສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາກົດຕົວຕໍ່ເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ ຫຼືເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່
meaning list.sentence: The case will come before the judge next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີດັ່ງກ່າວຈະໄປຕໍ່ໜ້າຜູ້ພິພາກສາໃນອາທິດໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ທີ່ຈະຕິດກັບບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: It all comes down to how much effort you put in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນທັງຫມົດແມ່ນຂຶ້ນກັບຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຫຼາຍປານໃດທີ່ທ່ານເອົາໃຈໃສ່.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຕໍ່, ອາສາສະຫມັກ
meaning list.sentence: No one came forward to claim the lost wallet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່​ມີ​ຜູ້​ໃດ​ມາ​ຕໍ່​ໄປ​ດຶງ​ເອົາ​ກະ​ເປົ໋າ​ທີ່​ສູນ​ເສຍ​ໄປ​.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: The plan came off better than expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ອອກມາດີກ່ວາທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: to break away, to break away
meaning list.sentence: The handle came off the door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມືຈັບປະຕູອອກມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກໃນ
meaning list.sentence: He cut in while I was explaining the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂັດຂວາງຂ້ອຍໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂ້ອຍກໍາລັງອະທິບາຍບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຊກແຊງ (ໃນການຈະລາຈອນ)
meaning list.sentence: A car suddenly cut in front of us.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັນໃດນັ້ນ ລົດຄັນໜຶ່ງໄດ້ຜ່ານຕໍ່ໜ້າພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອຍຫລັງ, ຍ້າຍອອກໄປ
meaning list.sentence: She drew back when the snake appeared.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖອຍຫລັງເມື່ອງູປະກົດຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳ ລາຍ ຄຳ ເວົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He promised to help but drew back at the last moment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ສັນຍາ​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ຊ່ອຍ​ເຫລືອ, ​ແຕ່​ໄດ້​ທຳລາຍ​ຄຳ​ສັນຍາ​ໃນ​ເວລາ​ສຸດ​ທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກຢູ່ຫລັງ, ຕົກຢູ່ຫລັງ
meaning list.sentence: The runner dropped back after the halfway point.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ແລ່ນໄດ້ລົ້ມລົງຫຼັງຈາກຈຸດເຄິ່ງທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກ, ລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The temperature dropped down below freezing last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມຫຼຸດລົງຕໍ່າກວ່າສູນໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກແຍກ, ກະແຈກກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The old book fell apart when I picked it up.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມເກົ່າໆໄດ້ລົ້ມລົງເມື່ອຂ້ອຍເອົາມັນຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູນເສຍການຄວບຄຸມ, ທໍາລາຍອາລົມ
meaning list.sentence: She fell apart after hearing the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຮູ້ສຶກ​ເສຍ​ໃຈ​ພາຍຫຼັງ​ໄດ້​ຍິນ​ຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: to quarrel, to quarrel
meaning list.sentence: They fell out over a small disagreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ການ​ຕົກ​ອອກ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ບໍ່​ເຫັນ​ດີ​ເປັນ​ການ​ເລັກ​ນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼົ່ນລົງ (ຜົມ, ແຂ້ວ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: His hair started falling out as he got older.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອລາວໃຫຍ່ຂຶ້ນ, ຜົມຂອງລາວເລີ່ມຫຼຸດລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ມເຫລວ, ລົ້ມເຫລວ
meaning list.sentence: The deal fell through at the last moment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ຕົກລົງດັ່ງກ່າວບໍ່ໄດ້ບັນລຸຜົນໃນນາທີສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ສ້ອມ​ແປງ​, ແກ້​ໄຂ​
meaning list.sentence: They fixed up the house before moving in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ສ້ອມແປງເຮືອນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຍ້າຍອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຈັດ​ຕັ້ງ (ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​, ການ​ນັດ​ຫມາຍ​)
meaning list.sentence: Can you fix up a meeting with the manager?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດຈັດກອງປະຊຸມກັບຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕາມ, ຕົກ
meaning list.sentence: The doctor will follow up with the patient next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍຈະເບິ່ງຄົນເຈັບໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ, ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າ
meaning list.sentence: She worked hard to get ahead in her career.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອກ້າວໄປສູ່ການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: to wander, ການ wander
meaning list.sentence: We used bikes to get around the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໃຊ້ລົດຖີບໄປທົ່ວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ​ຊະ​ນະ​ບັນ​ຫາ​
meaning list.sentence: We need to find a way to get around this problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງຊອກຫາວິທີທີ່ຈະເອົາຊະນະບັນຫານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນີ​ຈາກ​ການ​ລົງ​ໂທດ​
meaning list.sentence: He got away with cheating on the test.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຫລົບຫນີການລົງໂທດໂດຍການໂກງການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​, ທີ່​ຈະ​ລວມ​
meaning list.sentence: Everyone wants to get in on the new trend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກຄົນຕ້ອງການເຂົ້າຮ່ວມແນວໂນ້ມໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ມ່ວນຊື່ນ, ມ່ວນຊື່ນ
meaning list.sentence: He gets off on watching action movies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກເບິ່ງຮູບເງົາປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຫຼີກເວັ້ນການ, ຫນີ
meaning list.sentence: He tried to get out of doing the chores.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມຫຼີກລ່ຽງວຽກບ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກ​ຈາກ​ບາງ​ບ່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: We need to get out of the building quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ອອກຈາກອາຄານຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຈາກ, ຂອງຂວັນ
meaning list.sentence: She gave away her old clothes to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ບໍລິຈາກເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງເກົ່າຂອງລາວໃຫ້ກັບການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: His smile gave away his true feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮອຍຍິ້ມຂອງລາວເປີດເຜີຍຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກທີ່ແທ້ຈິງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕາມ, ປະຕິບັດຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: He decided to go after his dream of becoming a writer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈປະຕິບັດຕາມຄວາມຝັນຂອງລາວທີ່ຢາກເປັນນັກຂຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່ຄົນຫຼືບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The dog went after the ball.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາແລ່ນຕາມບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສືບຕໍ່, ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າ
meaning list.sentence: We decided to go ahead with the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕັດສິນໃຈສືບຕໍ່ໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ານ, ຂັດ
meaning list.sentence: It’s hard to go against family traditions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຍາກທີ່ຈະໄປຕໍ່ຕ້ານປະເພນີຂອງຄອບຄົວ.

meaning list.meaning: to wander around, to wander around
meaning list.sentence: We went around the city to explore its landmarks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຍ່າງ​ອ້ອມ​ຮອບ​ສໍາ​ຫຼວດ​ທີ່​ສໍາ​ຄັນ​ຂອງ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອໃຫ້ພຽງພໍ (ເພື່ອໃຫ້ພຽງພໍສໍາລັບທຸກຄົນ)
meaning list.sentence: There wasn’t enough food to go around.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີອາຫານບໍ່ພຽງພໍສໍາລັບທຸກຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນທີ່ຈະເຮັດຫຼືມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He really goes in for outdoor sports.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນໃນກິລາກາງແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ໃນ​ການ​ສອບ​ເສັງ​ຫຼື​ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ​
meaning list.sentence: She went in for the national math competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມການແຂ່ງຂັນຄະນິດສາດແຫ່ງຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປ​ບາງ​ບ່ອນ​ຫຼື​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ຜູ້​ໃດ​ຜູ້​ຫນຶ່ງ​
meaning list.sentence: I’ll go over to her house later to talk.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະໄປເຮືອນຂອງລາວຕໍ່ມາເພື່ອລົມກັບລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ດ້ອຍ​ໂອ​ກາດ​ຂອງ​ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ​, ທີ່​ຈະ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ດ້ອຍ​ໂອ​ກາດ​ຂອງ​ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ​
meaning list.sentence: During the storm, we had to go without electricity for hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາບໍ່ມີໄຟຟ້າເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງໃນລະຫວ່າງພາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher handed back the graded assignments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ສົ່ງຄືນວຽກທີ່ໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄະແນນ.

meaning list.meaning: to hand over , to hand over
meaning list.sentence: He handed over the keys to the new owner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມອບກະແຈໃຫ້ເຈົ້າຂອງໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: wander ປະມານ, hang out
meaning list.sentence: We used to hang around the park after school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ຈະ hang out ໃນ park ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ໂຮງ​ຮຽນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ສະ​ຫມໍ່າ​ສະ​ເຫມີ​ຫຼື​ຮັກ​ສາ​ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ​ຢູ່​ພາຍ​ໃຕ້​ການ​ຄວບ​ຄຸມ​
meaning list.sentence: Please hold down the papers so they don’t fly away.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖືເອກະສານເພື່ອບໍ່ໃຫ້ພວກມັນບິນໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຮັກສາວຽກ
meaning list.sentence: He’s been able to hold down a job for years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາມາດຮັກສາວຽກຂອງລາວໄດ້ຫລາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບແຫນ້ນ, ບໍ່ປ່ອຍໃຫ້ໄປ
meaning list.sentence: Hold on to the railing while you go down the stairs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈັບມືກັບ banister ເມື່ອລົງຂັ້ນໄດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖື​ບາງ​ສິ່ງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ (ຕົວ​ເລກ​)
meaning list.sentence: She held on to her dreams despite the challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ, ລາວຍຶດຫມັ້ນໃນຄວາມຝັນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢູ່ຫ່າງຈາກ, ບໍ່ໃຫ້ເຂົ້າຫາ
meaning list.sentence: Please keep off the grass.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢູ່ຫ່າງຈາກຫຍ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງ​ກັນ​, ໃຫ້​ຢູ່​ຫ່າງ​
meaning list.sentence: He tried to keep off unhealthy food.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມຢູ່ຫ່າງຈາກອາຫານທີ່ບໍ່ດີຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລີ່ມມີຜົນບັງຄັບໃຊ້
meaning list.sentence: The painkillers took a while to kick in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາບາງເວລາເພື່ອໃຫ້ຢາແກ້ປວດມີຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກອບສ່ວນ, ໃຫ້ການສະໜັບສະໜູນ
meaning list.sentence: Everyone kicked in some money for the gift.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກຄົນໄດ້ປະກອບສ່ວນເງິນຈໍານວນໜຶ່ງໃຫ້ກັບຂອງຂວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບອອກ, ລົບອອກ
meaning list.sentence: The boxer knocked out his opponent in the second round.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກມວຍໄດ້ເອົາຄູ່ແຂ່ງຂອງລາວອອກໃນຮອບທີສອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກໃຈ, ປະທັບໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The performance completely knocked me out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ ພະ ເຈົ້າ ໄດ້ blown ຫມົດ ໄປ ໂດຍ ການ ສະ ແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ, ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally knocked over the glass.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເຄາະ​ແກ້ວ​ໂດຍ​ບັງ​ເອີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອລັກ (ໂດຍສະເພາະຮ້ານຄ້າຫຼືທະນາຄານ)
meaning list.sentence: The robbers knocked over a small convenience store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນປຸ້ນຕະຫຼາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດຕັ້ງ, ວາງແຜນ
meaning list.sentence: She laid out all her ideas for the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຈັດຕັ້ງແນວຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວທັງຫມົດສໍາລັບໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຊ້ (ເງິນ)
meaning list.sentence: He laid out a lot of money for the new car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເງິນຫຼາຍໃນລົດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກຈາກທາງຫລັງ
meaning list.sentence: She left behind her old life and moved to a new city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ປະ​ຖິ້ມ​ຊີວິດ​ເກົ່າ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄວ້​ທາງ​ຫລັງ​ແລະ​ຍ້າຍ​ໄປ​ຢູ່​ເມືອງ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ລືມທາງຫລັງ
meaning list.sentence: He left his phone behind at the restaurant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລືມໂທລະສັບຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນຮ້ານອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກໄປ, ຢຸດ
meaning list.sentence: Let’s pick up where we left off yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ສືບຕໍ່ບ່ອນທີ່ພວກເຮົາອອກໄປໃນມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດເຮັດບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He finally left off smoking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທີ່ສຸດລາວໄດ້ຢຸດເຊົາການສູບຢາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ອຍອອກ
meaning list.sentence: She let the dog out into the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປ່ອຍຫມາອອກໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງສຽງດັງ (ສຽງດັງ, ສຽງຫົວ)
meaning list.sentence: He let out a loud laugh.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫົວເລາະດັງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕອບສະຫນອງຄວາມຄາດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: The movie didn’t live up to my expectations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາບໍ່ໄດ້ຕອບສະຫນອງຄວາມຄາດຫວັງຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ດໍາລົງຊີວິດຕາມມາດຕະຖານ
meaning list.sentence: She tried to live up to her family’s high standards.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມດໍາລົງຊີວິດຕາມມາດຕະຖານສູງຂອງຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັອກ
meaning list.sentence: Make sure you lock up the house before you leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າທ່ານລັອກເຮືອນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈໍາຄຸກ
meaning list.sentence: The criminal was locked up for ten years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີອາຍາໄດ້ຖືກຈໍາຄຸກເປັນເວລາສິບປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ດູຖູກ, ດູຖູກ
meaning list.sentence: You shouldn’t look down on people who are less fortunate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າບໍ່ຄວນດູຖູກຄົນທີ່ມີໂຊກໜ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ສືບ​ສວນ​, ການ​ກວດ​ສອບ​
meaning list.sentence: The police are looking into the cause of the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງສືບສວນສາເຫດຂອງໄຟໄໝ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາໃຈໃສ່, ຮັກສາຕາ
meaning list.sentence: Look out for cars when crossing the street.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະວັງລົດເມື່ອຂ້າມຖະໜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນໃຜຜູ້ຫນຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: She always looks out for her younger brother.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເບິ່ງອອກສໍາລັບນ້ອງຊາຍຂອງລາວສະເຫມີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ທົບ​ທວນ​ຄືນ​, ການ​ກວດ​ສອບ​
meaning list.sentence: I looked through the documents before signing them.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າໄດ້ທົບທວນຄືນເອກະສານກ່ອນທີ່ຈະລົງນາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He looked through me as if I wasn’t there.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ສົນໃຈຂ້ອຍ, ຄືກັບວ່າຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຢູ່ທີ່ນັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຫນີ, ເລື່ອນໄປ
meaning list.sentence: The thieves made off with the stolen jewelry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນໄດ້ຫລົບຫນີໄປພ້ອມກັບເພັດພອຍທີ່ເຂົາເຈົ້າລັກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົມ (ສິ່ງຂອງຫຼືຄົນ)
meaning list.sentence: I mixed up the files and gave him the wrong one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າໄດ້ຜ່ານໄຟລ໌ແລະໃຫ້ລາວຜິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ
meaning list.sentence: The confusing instructions really mixed me up.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍແປກໃຈແທ້ໆກັບຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ສັບສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍ້າຍ​ກັບ​ຄືນ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​
meaning list.sentence: He moved back to his hometown after retirement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກກິນເບັ້ຍບໍານານ, ລາວໄດ້ຍ້າຍໄປບ້ານເກີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອຍຫລັງ
meaning list.sentence: Please move back so everyone can see.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢືນຄືນເພື່ອໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນສາມາດເຫັນໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຫ້ອງ​, ຂັ້ນ​ຕອນ​ທີ​
meaning list.sentence: Can you move over so I can sit down?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດຍ່າງອອກໄປເພື່ອຂ້ອຍນັ່ງໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນລົມ
meaning list.sentence: He passed out from the heat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ fainted ຈາກຄວາມຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຈກຢາຍ (ເອກະສານ ແລະ ອື່ນໆ.)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher passed out the test papers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູແຈກຢາຍເອກະສານສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈ່າຍເປັນຈໍານວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The insurance company paid out a large sum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດປະກັນໄພໄດ້ຈ່າຍເງິນຈໍານວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກິນ​ຢ່າງ​ບໍ່​ເຕັມ​ໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He picked at his food but didn’t really eat much.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກິນອາຫານຂອງລາວຢ່າງບໍ່ເຕັມໃຈ, ແຕ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ກິນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິຈານ, ຊອກຫາຄວາມຜິດ
meaning list.sentence: She keeps picking at everything I do.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພົບຄວາມຜິດໃນທຸກສິ່ງທີ່ຂ້ອຍເຮັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຫ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: He pulled apart the engine to see what was wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເອົາເຄື່ອງຈັກອອກຈາກກັນແລະເຫັນວ່າບັນຫາແມ່ນຫຍັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຍກຕົວ (ຕໍ່ສູ້ປະຊາຊົນ, ແລະອື່ນໆ)
meaning list.sentence: They had to pull the two boys apart.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຕ້ອງ​ແຍກ​ເດັກ​ນ້ອຍ​ສອງ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: He managed to pull off a difficult project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຈັດການກັບໂຄງການທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໃກ້ເສັ້ນທາງ
meaning list.sentence: The car pulled off to the side of the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດ​ໄດ້​ແລ່ນ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ຂ້າງ​ທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງອອກ, ດຶງອອກ
meaning list.sentence: She pulled out a notebook from her bag.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາປື້ມບັນທຶກອອກຈາກກະເປົາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນ​ຕົວ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ກິດ​ຈະ​ກໍາ​
meaning list.sentence: The company pulled out of the deal at the last minute.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖອນຕົວອອກຈາກຂໍ້ຕົກລົງໃນນາທີສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາ​ໃສ່​ໃນ​ສະ​ຖານ​ທີ່​
meaning list.sentence: Please put the books back on the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາວາງປຶ້ມຄືນໃສ່ຊັ້ນວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເລື່ອນ​ເວ​ລາ​, ການ​ຊັກ​ຊ້າ​
meaning list.sentence: The meeting was put back by an hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ເລື່ອນ​ເວ​ລາ​ຫນຶ່ງ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທາງໂທລະສັບ
meaning list.sentence: Can you put me through to the manager?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຂ້ອຍກັບຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດເຜີຍສະຖານະການທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: She was put through a lot of stress during the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມກົດດັນຫຼາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົດທົນ, ອົດທົນ
meaning list.sentence: I can't put up with his rude behavior anymore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ​ຢືນ​ຢູ່​ກັບ​ພຶດ​ຕິ​ກໍາ​ທີ່​ຫຍາບ​ຄາຍ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ອີກ​ຕໍ່​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈີກອອກ, ຂໍເງິນຫຼາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The shop ripped me off by charging double the price.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຄ້າໄດ້ຕັດຂ້ອຍໂດຍການຄິດຄ່າສອງເທົ່າຂອງລາຄາ.

meaning list.meaning: to tear off , ້​ໍ​າ​ຕາ​ອອກ​
meaning list.sentence: He ripped off the tag from his new shirt.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຖອດ​ປ້າຍ​ອອກ​ເສື້ອ​ໃໝ່​ຂອງ​ລາວ ແລະ​ເອົາ​ມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ຕະຫຼາດ, ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company rolled out its new product last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເປີດຕົວຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດ, ແຜ່ຂະຫຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: They rolled out the carpet for the guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ເອົາ​ຜ້າ​ພົມ​ໃຫ້​ແຂກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ່ນກັບຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: He ran back home to get his phone.
